verses.verse: A Psalm of David; when he changed his behavior before Abimelech, who drove him away, and he departed. I will bless <WH1288> Jehovah <WH3068> at all times <WH6256>: His praise <WH8416> shall continually <WH8548> be in my mouth <WH6310>.
My soul <WH5315> shall make her boast <WH1984> in Jehovah <WH3068>: The meek <WH6035> shall hear <WH8085> thereof <WH8055>, and be glad.
Oh magnify <WH1431> Jehovah <WH3068> with me <WH7311>, And let us exalt his name <WH8034> together <WH3162>.
I sought <WH1875> Jehovah <WH3068>, and he answered <WH6030> me <WH5337>, And delivered me from all my fears <WH4035>.
They looked <WH5027> unto him <WH5102>, and were radiant; And their faces <WH6440> shall never be confounded <WH2659>.
This poor man <WH6041> cried <WH7121>, and Jehovah <WH3068> heard <WH8085> him <WH3467>, And saved him out of all his troubles <WH6869>.
The angel <WH4397> of Jehovah <WH3068> encampeth <WH2583> round about <WH5439> them that fear <WH3373> him <WH2502>, And delivereth them.
Oh taste <WH2938> and see <WH7200> that Jehovah <WH3068> is good <WH2896>: Blessed <WH835> is the man <WH1397> that taketh refuge in him <WH2620>.
Oh fear <WH3372> Jehovah <WH3068>, ye his saints <WH6918>; For there is no want <WH4270> to them that fear him <WH3373>.
The young lions <WH3715> do lack <WH7326>, and suffer hunger <WH7456>; But they that seek <WH1875> Jehovah <WH3068> shall not want <WH2637> any good thing <WH2896>.
Come <WH3212>, ye children <WH1121>, hearken <WH8085> unto me <WH3925>: I will teach you the fear <WH3374> of Jehovah <WH3068>.
What man <WH376> is he that desireth <WH2655> life <WH2416>, And loveth <WH157> many days <WH3117>, that he may see <WH7200> good <WH2896>?
Keep <WH5341> thy tongue <WH3956> from evil <WH7451>, And thy lips <WH8193> from speaking <WH1696> guile <WH4820>.
Depart <WH5493> from evil <WH7451>, and do <WH6213> good <WH2896>; Seek <WH1245> peace <WH7965>, and pursue it <WH7291>.
The eyes <WH5869> of Jehovah <WH3068> are toward the righteous <WH6662>, And his ears <WH241> are open unto their cry <WH7775>.
The face <WH6440> of Jehovah <WH3068> is against them that do <WH6213> evil <WH7451>, To cut off <WH3772> the remembrance <WH2143> of them from the earth <WH776>.
The righteous cried <WH6817>, and Jehovah <WH3068> heard <WH8085>, And delivered <WH5337> them out of all their troubles <WH6869>.
Jehovah <WH3068> is nigh <WH7138> unto them that are of a broken <WH7665> heart <WH3820>, And saveth <WH3467> such as are of a contrite <WH1793> spirit <WH7307>.
Many <WH7227> are the afflictions <WH7451> of the righteous <WH6662>; But Jehovah <WH3068> delivereth him out of them all <WH5337>.
He keepeth <WH8104> all his bones <WH6106>: Not one <WH259> of them <WH2007> is broken <WH7665>.
Evil <WH7451> shall slay <WH4191> the wicked <WH7563>; And they that hate <WH8130> the righteous <WH6662> shall be condemned <WH816>.
Jehovah <WH3068> redeemeth <WH6299> the soul <WH5315> of his servants <WH5650>; And none of them that take refuge <WH2620> in him shall be condemned <WH816>.
